      ClusterConnection Server.getClusterConnection()
      Returns a reference to the servers' cluster connection.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中ClusterConnection的使用

      实现ClusterConnection的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  ConnectionUtils.ShortCircuitingClusterConnection
      A ClusterConnection that will short-circuit RPC making direct invocations against the localhost if the invocation target is 'this' server; save on network and protobuf invocations.
      声明为ClusterConnection的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected ClusterConnection RpcRetryingCallerWithReadReplicas.cConnection 
      protected ClusterConnection RegionAdminServiceCallable.connection 
      返回ClusterConnection的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static ClusterConnection ConnectionUtils.createShortCircuitConnection(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, ExecutorService pool, User user, ServerName serverName, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.AdminService.BlockingInterface admin, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.ClientProtos.ClientService.BlockingInterface client)
      Creates a short-circuit connection that can bypass the RPC layer (serialization, deserialization, networking, etc..) when talking to a local server.
      protected ClusterConnection ClientScanner.getConnection() 
      protected ClusterConnection RegionServerCallable.getConnection()

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void ServerManager.closeRegionSilentlyAndWait(ClusterConnection connection, ServerName server, RegionInfo region, long timeout)
      Contacts a region server and waits up to timeout ms to close the region.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中ClusterConnection的使用

      声明为ClusterConnection的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected ClusterConnection HRegionServer.clusterConnection
      Cluster connection to be shared by services.
      返回ClusterConnection的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected ClusterConnection HRegionServer.createClusterConnection()
      Create a 'smarter' Connection, one that is capable of by-passing RPC if the request is to the local server; i.e. a short-circuit Connection.
      ClusterConnection HRegionServer.getClusterConnection()
